full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 219 of 236 1123 LC3Cmax7 Dawson - direct 1 THE COURT: You may. 2 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I'd ask to approach the witness with what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 1, 3, and 4, and I'll show them to defense counsel first. 6 THE COURT: Okay 7 MS. COMEY: May I approach, your Honor? 8 THE COURT: You may. 9 BY MS. COMEY: 10 Q. Sergeant Dawson, I've just handed you what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 1, 3, and 4. Do those look familiar to you? 12 A. Yes. 13 14 Q. What do they look like? 15 A. They look like the message books we found during the search warrant. 16 17 Q. Are you able to confirm that these are the same message -- 18 THE COURT: I'm sorry, Sergeant Dawson. Could you remove your mask and could you pull up a little closer to the mic, please. Thank you. 20 21 Q. Are you able to confirm that these are the same message pads that you seized that day? 22 23 A. They appear to be. I can't confirm 100 percent. I haven't been in contact with them. 24 25 Q. Is that because you are not familiar with the unique SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018320
